form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Boyd H. Reynolds Registered Immigration Attorney, FOIA(b)(6)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/20/2023 BOYD H. REYNOLDS REGISTERED IMMIGRATION ATTORNEY SUITE 214 DOUGLAS BUILDING 257 SOUTH SPRING STREET LOS ANGELES, CALIFORNIA 90012 August 3, 1966 MADISON 5-2597 - MADISON 5 2597 IN ANSWERING PLEASE REFER TO NO. 1/784 District Director Immigration & Naturalization Service Los Angeles, California Please see files: FOIA (b) (6) Dear Sir : Natz. No.8886628 Re: May Ching Chow, citizen petitioner for Chow Soo King, Wong Man Fai, Wong Man Chik, Wong Ching Far and FOIA (b)(6) Enclosed please find 5 completed petitions together with statutory fees of $50; Photograph evidence ( 3 pages with copies ) ; Chinese signature form and certificate of naturalization No.8886628 with petition No.274982 showing petitioner was naturalized at the U.S. District Court on May 27,1966. Enclosed also find 2 old correspondence ( with copies and translation) ; affidavit of Anna Esteves in duplicate; and affidavit of Philip Chow in duplicate. In view of the fact that voluminious and ample persuasive evidence is enclosed, will you kindly process and approve the petitions as soon as it is possible. Kindly advise me if there is any interview. Your kind attention in this matter is appreciated. Sincerely yours, Boyd Boys H. Reynolds H.
